TopicTitle: Get this space station made of vanilla parts into a stable orbit

Articles.Content:
As you see I didn\'t get it into space, however you must get it into orbit with the solid rockets still attached, your design can vary slightly as long as it\'s around the same complexity and size. If you can bring the thing back in and land it you get a billion extra points.

Rules:

No mods of any kind

The KSS must look very similar to the one posted, if you want to make it more complex that\'s fine.

1. You forgot the parachute!

2. Post craft file and I might take a look. Should be doable fairly easy, not that much mass there. Shape may be iffy. May need struts. Lots of struts.
